documentation.text: @notice Integer value to implement a concept of time independently of the messy block.timestamp
@notice Boolean stating if the Shardable is active and tradeable or not.
@notice Mapping pointing to related info of a Shard given the bytes of a unique Shard instance.
@notice Mapping pointing to a currently valid shard given the address of its owner.
@notice Mapping pointing to a boolean stating if a given Shard is for sale or not.
@notice Mapping pointing to related sale info of a Shard given the bytes of a unique Shard instance.
@notice Modifier that requires the msg.sender to be a current valid Shard holder.
@notice Modifier that requires a given Shard to be currently valid.
@notice Modifier that makes sure the entity is active and not liquidized/dissolved.

@notice Modifier that requires the msg.sender to be the owner of a given Shard
 @param shard The Shard, whose ownership is tested for.
@notice Constructor function that pushes the first Shard being the property of the Shardable creator.

@notice Cancels a sell of a given Shard.
 @param shard The shard to be put off sale.
@notice Returns the clock.
@notice Returns the clock, in which a shard will or has expired.
@notice Returns the price, at which a shard is for sale.

@notice Returns a boolean stating if a given shard is currently valid or not.
 @param shard The shard, whose validity is to be checked for.

@notice Checks if address is a shard holder - at least a partial owner of the contract.
 @param account The address to be checked for.

@notice Cancels a sell of a given Shard.
 @param shard The shard to be put off sale.

natspec.author: Frederik W. L. Christoffersen
natspec.details: historicShards are used to show proof of ownership at different points of time.

params.expirationClock: The clock at which the shard expired.
params.shard: The Shard byte identifier, which expired.

params.creationClock: The clock at which the shard was created.
params.owner: The owner of the created Shard.
params.shard: The Shard byte identifier, which was created.

params.denominator: Denominator of the absolute fraction of the Shard put for sale.
params.numerator: Numerator of the absolute fraction of the Shard put for sale.
params.price: The amount which the Shard is for sale as. The token address being the valuta.
params.shard: The shard that was put for sale.
params.to: The specifically set buyer of the sale, if any.
params.tokenAddress: The address of the token that is accepted when purchasing. A value of 0x0 represents ether.

params.denominator: Denominator of the absolute fraction of the Shard that was sold.
params.numerator: Numerator of the absolute fraction of the Shard that was sold.
params.price: The amount which the Shard was for sale for. The token address being the valuta.
params.shard: The shard that was sold from.
params.tokenAddress: The address of the token that was accepted in the purchase. A value of 0x0 represents ether.

active().notice: Boolean stating if the Shardable is active and tradeable or not.

cancelSale(bytes32).notice: Cancels a sell of a given Shard.

params.shard: The shard to be put off sale.

constructor.notice: Constructor function that pushes the first Shard being the property of the Shardable creator.

getShardExpirationClock(bytes32).notice: Returns the clock, in which a shard will or has expired.

getShardSalePrice(bytes32).notice: Returns the price, at which a shard is for sale.

infoByShard(bytes32).notice: Mapping pointing to related info of a Shard given the bytes of a unique Shard instance.

isShardHolder(address).notice: Checks if address is a shard holder - at least a partial owner of the contract.

params.account: The address to be checked for.

isValidShard(bytes32).notice: Returns a boolean stating if a given shard is currently valid or not.

params.shard: The shard, whose validity is to be checked for.

purchase(bytes32).details: If the purchase is with tokens (ie. tokenAddress != 0x0), first call 'token.approve(Shardable.address, salePrice);'
purchase(bytes32).notice: Purchases a listed Shard for sale.

params.shard: The shard of which a fraction will be purchased.

putForSale(bytes32,uint256,uint256,addre.notice: Puts a given shard for sale.

params.denominator: Denominator of the absolute fraction of the Shard to be put for sale.
params.numerator: Numerator of the absolute fraction of the Shard to be put for sale.
params.price: The amount which the Shard is for sale as. The token address being the valuta.
params.shard: The shard to be put for sale.
params.to: The specifically set buyer of the sale. Open to anyone, if address(0).
params.tokenAddress: The address of the token that is accepted when purchasing. A value of 0x0 represents ether.

shardByOwner(address).notice: Mapping pointing to a currently valid shard given the address of its owner.

shardExisted(bytes32,uint256).notice: Returns a boolean stating if the given shard was valid at a given clock.

params.atClock: The clock to be checked for.
params.shard: The shard, whose validity is to be checked for.

split(bytes32,uint256,uint256,address).notice: Splits a currently valid shard into two new ones. One is assigned to the receiver. The rest to the previous owner.

params.denominator: Denominator of the absolute fraction, which will be subtracted from the previous shard and sent to the receiver.
params.numerator: Numerator of the absolute fraction, which will be subtracted from the previous shard and sent to the receiver.
params.to: The receiver of the new Shard.

natspec.notice: This contract is used to fractionalize a non-fungible token. Be aware that a sell transfers a service fee of 2.5% to Counekt.
natspec.title: A shardable/fractional non-fungible token that can be fractually owned via Shards.
